description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fun for all ages.  Players flip over tiles to match pairs.  Based on difficulty setting, the board may or may not rotate when right or wrong. Easy-No rotation(6 pairs) Normal-Rotates when wrong(6 pairs) Hard- Rotates when right or wrong(9 pairs) Extreme- Continuously rotates(9 pairs)
description.short: Fun for all ages.  Players flip over tiles to match pairs.  Based on difficulty setting, the board may or may not rotate when right or wrong. Easy-No rotation(6 pairs) Normal-Rotates when wrong(6 pairs) Hard- Rotates when right or wrong(9 pairs) Extreme- Continuously rotates(9 pairs)
